constantValues: Activity that represents work done to satisfy a customer's need.

definitions.description: Activity that represents work done to satisfy a customer's need.

members.name: serviceId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the associated service.

members.description: Unique identifier of the associated service.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the service was created.

members.description: Date and time when the service was created.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'createdBy' attribute below to the 'Service' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: createdBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the service.

value.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the service.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Date and time when the service was last modified.

members.description: Date and time when the service was last modified.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'modifiedBy' attribute below to the 'Service' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the service.

value.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the service.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'createdOnBehalfBy' attribute below to the 'Service' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the service.

value.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the service.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'modifiedOnBehalfBy' attribute below to the 'Service' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the service.

value.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the service.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Organization' adds the 'organizationId' attribute below to the 'Service' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: anchorOffset

constantValues: Used in conjunction with granularity to describes when services can be performed in relation to midnight on a given day.

members.description: Used in conjunction with granularity to describes when services can be performed in relation to midnight on a given day.

members.name: description

constantValues: Description of activity that represents work done to satisfy a customer's need.

members.description: Description of activity that represents work done to satisfy a customer's need.

members.name: granularity

constantValues: Describes how often the service is performed.

members.description: Describes how often the service is performed.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'initialStatusCode_display' is added to the 'Service' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'initialStatusCode'
arguments.name: initialStatusCode_display

members.name: initialStatusCode

constantValues: Initial status reason for the service activity.

members.description: Initial status reason for the service activity.

members.name: isSchedulable

constantValues: Information about whether the service can be scheduled.

members.description: Information about whether the service can be scheduled.

members.name: isVisible

constantValues: Information about whether the service is visible to users.

members.description: Information about whether the service is visible to users.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'ResourceSpecification' adds the 'resourceSpecId' attribute below to the 'Service' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: resourceSpecId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the resource specification with which the service is associated.

value.description: Unique identifier of the resource specification with which the service is associated.

members.name: strategyId

constantValues: Value that is taken from PluginTypeId in the Plugin Type record for the scheduling strategy. This is the ID of the scheduling strategy plug-in associated with the service.

members.description: Value that is taken from PluginTypeId in the Plugin Type record for the scheduling strategy. This is the ID of the scheduling strategy plug-in associated with the service.
